Posts.EditableText:
I saved my game in code and forgot a character in the code, so now when I try to open the file for editing it wont let me because there is an error!
How do i get past this?
Posts.HTML:
I saved my game in code and forgot a character in the code, so now when I try to open the file for editing it wont let me because there is an error!
How do i get past this?

Posts.EditableText: The aslx file is a text document. You can open it in any text editor and correct the problem. Or if you can't figure out how, post it here, and someone will fix it for you!
